articles.author: Beth Mole
articles.title: This may be the grossest eye pic ever—but the cause is what’s truly horrifying - Ars Technica
articles.description: Hypervirulent germ nearly destroys man, invading brain and blowing out an eye.

articles.title: 10 breakthrough technologies to expect in 2026 : Short Wave - NPR
articles.description: Wanna know where tech is headed this year? MIT Technology Review has answers. They compile an annual list called "10 Breakthrough Technologies". Today, host Regina G. Barber speaks with executive editor Amy Nordrum about the list, and they get into everything…
